import React, { useState, useEffect, useMemo, useRef, useReducer } from 'react'; import "../styles.css" const ACTIONS = { ADD_DIGIT: "add-digit" } function reducer(state, {type, payload}) { } export default function Calculator() { const [{currentOperand, previousOperand, operation}, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, {}) return ( <>

Welcome to Calculator!

{previousOperand} {operation}
{currentOperand}
) }
